sentences.sContent: He admitted a lack of motivation and a feeling of sloth.
sentences.sCn: 他承认自己缺乏动力，感觉懒散。

remMethod.val: slo(看作slow慢的) + th(看作thing事) → 做事慢吞吞的 → 懒惰

trans.tranCn: 怠惰，懒惰；[脊椎] 树懒
trans.tranOther: an animal in Central and South America that moves very slowly, has grey fur, and lives in trees
